channel.title: Uberflip Help Center Articles - Billing and payment
channel.description: Latest articles from Uberflip Help Center

item.title: View Your Invoices
item.description:
You can view your current and past invoices at any time.

 

Before you Begin

  • To view invoices for your Uberflip account, you need to be the Primary User on the account.

 

Viewing Your Invoices

  1. Log in to your Uberflip account.
  2. In the top right corner, hover the mouse over your name to expand the menu, then click on Account Settings to go to your My Profile page.

  3. In the sidebar menu on the left, the Account section should already be expanded. Click on Billing Details & Invoices here.



  4. You'll see your billing details on the right. Scroll down to the Invoice History section to see your invoices. Click on Download next to an invoice to view it.

item.title: Update Your Credit Card Information
item.description:
Old credit card expired? Need to use a different card? Whatever the reason, here's how you update your credit card information in Uberflip.

 

Before you Begin

  • To update your credit card details, you need to be the Primary User on your Uberflip account.
  • We can accept MasterCard, Visa, or American Express credit cards.

 

Add or Update a Credit Card in your Uberflip Account

  1. Log in to your Uberflip account.
  2. In the top right corner, hover the mouse over your name to expand the menu, then click on Account Settings to go to your My Profile page.

  3. In the sidebar menu on the left, click on Account to expand that section, then click on Billing Details & Invoices.



  4. You'll see your current billing details on the right. Under Payment Methods, click on Edit next to Credit Card.

  5. The credit card details form will appear. If you previously added a card, you will see its details (the first and last name on the card, the last 4 digits of the number, and the expiration date). Otherwise, these fields will be blank.



  6. Make any changes as needed, then click on either Add (if you're adding a card for the first time), or Update (if you're editing a previously added card).
  7. You're done! Note that if there's a problem, you'll see an error message, and can try again.

item.title: Change Your Billing Email
item.description:
If you need to change the email address at which your organization receives billing-related emails (such as invoices), you can do so at any time.

 

Before you begin

  • Only the Primary User of the Uberflip account can update an organization's billing email.

 

Change your organization's email address for billing

  1. Log in to your Uberflip account.
  2. In the top right corner, hover the mouse over your name to expand the menu, then click on Account Settings to go to your My Profile page.

  3. In the sidebar menu on the left, the Account section should already be expanded. Click on Billing Details & Invoices here.



  4. You'll see your billing details on the right, including your current billing email:

  5. To change the email address that billing-related communications are sent to, just type the new email into the field, then click on Save.

  6. Need to have emails sent to multiple addresses? Add more than one address by separating them with commas. Don't forget to hit Save!
